text:
Hey Jae! Thanks!

> Is the sample above being used in the middle pane?
Yes

> Is the ButtonRow nested within any other components?
Yes
```<Flex direction="row">
    <Box flex={2}>
        <Flex direction="column" gap="xs">
            <>
                ...
                <ButtonRow
					dropDownButtonOptions={{ size: 'small', variant: 'secondary' }}
				>```
I believe the blue container is the Flex parent.

> How many Buttons are contained within the ButtonRow?
First screenshot, three. About the same size as the “Backoffice” one.
Second screenshot - just one.
I've just sent something to you Sejal :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Sejal, in our app, definitely the former. We fetch HubSpot data, and combine it with third-party data to process and generate more insights. We offer user-specific AI agents for web research and other automations, with their results displayed in CRM cards.
I definitely prefer server-side data processing.

Hey! Is there a good way to align Text inside of Lists - specifically the `inline-divided` variant?
The first screenshot is <Text> nested inside of a <List> with the `inline-divided` variant. The second screenshot - which lines up better - is React fragments inside of the same list

It would be awesome if the CrmCardActions could work with onClick events instead of just CrmActions, I would love to have the actions trigger custom panels but currently it's not possible. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/crm-action-components/crm-card-actions>
